'''Dorea Sand''' is an unseen character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. She is alluded to in "[[First of His Name]]".
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Dorea's story is the same. She is known to wield a morningstar, using it to knock oranges from trees in House Martell's [[Water Gardens]].
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Dorea Sand is the seventh of the eight [[Bastardy|bastard]] daughters of [[Prince]] [[Oberyn Martell]], known as the "[[Sand Snakes]]". Her mother is Oberyn's [[paramour]], [[Ellaria Sand]].

===[[Season 4]]===
Oberyn mentions his eight bastard daughters to Queen [[Cersei Lannister]].<ref>"[[First of His Name]]"</ref>
